name: code-coverage-demo
description: A sample Node.js app demonstrating code coverage with self-hosted runner

scripts.coverage:full: npm run test:coverage && npm run badges
scripts.codecov:start: cd codecov-self-hosted && (command -v podman-compose >/dev/null && podman-compose up -d || (podman compose version >/dev/null 2>&1 && podman compose up -d || docker compose up -d))
scripts.codecov:stop: cd codecov-self-hosted && (command -v podman-compose >/dev/null && podman-compose down || (podman compose version >/dev/null 2>&1 && podman compose down || docker compose down))
scripts.codecov:logs: cd codecov-self-hosted && (command -v podman-compose >/dev/null && podman-compose logs -f || (podman compose version >/dev/null 2>&1 && podman compose logs -f || docker compose logs -f))
scripts.codecov:ps: cd codecov-self-hosted && (command -v podman-compose >/dev/null && podman-compose ps || (podman compose version >/dev/null 2>&1 && podman compose ps || docker compose ps))
